topic.title: ITS_PKT500 Abstract

body.p: The Integrated Test Set 500G Packet Tester (ITS_PKT500) generates and monitors up to 500 Gbps of packet traffic carried over up to 120 channels within the COPI subsystem. It supports generation of programmable sequences of packet lengths and partially programmable payload patterns. It supports monitoring of packet data integrity, packet sequence, and end to end datapath latency. ITS_PKT500 provides status monitoring and statistics counters for performance monitoring and error analysis. It also provides a 20Kbyte capture buffer with a programmable capture trigger.
